trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> starts running.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.

A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity.
